editPersonalInfo.title: Edit Personal Information

editPersonalInfo.fileSizeLimitExceeded: File size exceeds the limit of 500KB.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.weMayCollect: We may collect the following types of information:

sections.title: 1.1 Personal Information
items: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details.
Login credentials, including those linked with social media or Google sign-ins.

sections.title: 1.2 Location Data
items: GPS location to enable features like repair location tracking and technician navigation.

sections.title: 1.3 Transactional Data
items: Payment details (e.g., credit/debit card information), invoices, and transaction history.

sections.title: 1.4 Usage Data
items: Information about your device, including IP address, browser type, operating system, and app usage data.

sections.title: 1.5 Media Files
items: Images or videos uploaded to the platform for repair service requests or during technician updates.

uses: Process and manage repair service requests and job details.
Enable real-time tracking and provide status updates.
Improve user experience through analytics and feedback.
Communicate important updates, such as notifications and support responses.
privacyPolicy.infoSharingDesc: We do not sell or rent your information to third parties. However, we may share your data in the following scenarios:
details: With Technicians: To provide job details and enable communication for repair services.
Service Providers: With third-party vendors who help us process payments or analyze app performance.
Legal Compliance: If required by law or to protect the safety and rights of our users.

data_retention.title: Data Retention
data_retention.description: We retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy unless a longer retention period is required by law.

your_rights.title: Your Rights
details: Access, update, or delete your personal information.
Request a copy of your data or restrict its processing.
your_rights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at [Insert Contact Email].

security_of_your_information.title: Security of Your Information
security_of_your_information.description: We use industry-standard measures to protect your data. However, no electronic storage method is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies_and_tracking.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies_and_tracking.description: Our Services may use cookies or similar technologies to enhance user experience and track usage patterns. You can manage cookie preferences through your device settings.

third_party_links.title: Third-Party Links
third_party_links.description: Our app may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for their privacy practices.

updates_to_privacy_policy.title: Updates to This Privacy Policy
updates_to_privacy_policy.description: We may update this policy from time to time. Changes will be communicated through the app or website. Please review this policy periodically for updates.
